pros: Good fit that's easy to grip
Features 2 layers: soft silicone inner sleeve and smooth outer shell
Extra large port cutouts ensure proper fit for chargers and headphone jacks
cons: Silicone sides may stick to pockets and can be prone to discoloration

customer_reviews.title: It's the Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I'm a "dropper." I purchased this case for a phone to use in between selling and purchasing a new phone. I've used it much longer than I expected and, of course with the occasional clumsiness and drops, it's protected my phone and screen perfectly. It's a great price for a case that REALLY does the job. Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Mama23

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm always very skeptical of cases offline, and I've always been a longtime otterbox gal. However my old case was kinda looking ratty and I wanted something a little more colorful and not as bulky. So I went out on a whim and bought this one. I'm very clumsy so I needed it to be sturdy. So it has a gel layer that goes over the phone itself, and then it sits in a hard shell, I bought this and one of those glass screen protectors and wahlah, it's just as good as the fifty dollar cases but for a fraction of the cost. Love the rose gold color as well!
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for a little over a month now. I’m actually quite pleased with it. The rubber helps absorb shock if the phone is dropped. All openings are big enough to use the phone functions properly. The color has not faded or changed. That’s my biggest pet peeve so I’m very pleased. I also like the rose gold that matches my phone. The case itself isn’t bulky and fits in my hand or pocket well. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Moo Moo

customer_reviews.title: Top quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for about 2 1/2 months now. The color is beautiful! The rubber is a little more peachy than in the picture. The plastic rose gold is gorgeous! I thought for sure the rubber would start absorbing dirt and oil from my hands changing the color to grey but it hasn’t discolored at all! I’ve dropped my phone a few times and the case has fully protected it. My only complaint is the plastic piece that curves over the vibration switch somehow got slightly bent. There is now a small gab between the plastic and the rubber. Other than that it still looks brand new! I would definitely recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gillette

customer_reviews.title: easy fix
customer_reviews.text: so far it's working fine? haven't dropped it to test it. the cover fits snug and I like the hard back. I can clean the case easier with the hard back, yet still have the protection of the silicone underneath. color is exactly like the rose color of my I phone. the phone with the case still fits in my wristlet. so it is really a slim fit case. this is important to me because I don't carry a purse. the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: DJT

customer_reviews.title: Eh.  It was $6. Didn’t expect much.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my 3 yr old otterbox cracked. This is different in a couple noticeable ways - otterbox has a sturdy frame part that was by the ports, where this one doesn’t. I notice it specifically when I get my phone out of my pocket, naturally grabbing the port side, and only pull up silicone. Also, the silicone cut out for the charging port covers too much, and need to pull it down in order to charge - otherwise the charger butts against the silicone and eventually falls out of the port.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L

customer_reviews.title: pink iphone case that protects!
customer_reviews.text: I love pink. It matches my pink iPhone perfectly and most importantly protects my phoen very well. Ive had it for months now and it has fallen many times and my phone is still spanking new and unharmed. I recommend it to anyone who is looking for a case that protects and is girly at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Rose Gold: Beautiful and does its job
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect if you're looking for a slim case but also plenty of perfection. Not at all saying your phone could survive circumstances in which a bulky otterbox would save it, but if you're clumsy and just drop it a few feet from time to time, this feels as though it would do the job. I also have a rose gold phone and the hard shell matches perfectly and the slightly lighter color of the rubber gives it a beautiful contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Juel Merc

customer_reviews.title: Not much protection
customer_reviews.text: The outer shell (rose gold case) does not cover the corners. I foresee this being a major problem as the case is very slick and when I drop the phone it usually lands on a corner, as evidenced in the picture. I actually bought this to replace my second Otterbox which had a broken corner. Would absolutely not have purchased if I had realized this. Also, no dust covers over the ports. Not worth the postage to return but also not worth risking my phone. Probably just use it until I can get another Otterbox, soon. Although those corners broke, they offered double the protection and saved my phone. Chalk this one up in online shopping loss column.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for each of my girls. They drop their phones a lot. And occasionally throw them as they are quite young. The phones have held up well. And the cases are perfect! I love that they have both of my girls favorite colors. It's not easy to find the same case with pink and purple that is a good quality case like these. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: SyntheticMollie

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, good price - BUT..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 y.o. granddaughter and it looked almost new, a few minute scratches on the corners of the case but worked well. Came with a "no hassel" 90 day warranty. Don't you know @ 100+ days the charging port came loose and you can't charge the phone, the phone has to go to Apple for repair. I doubt it was my granddaughters fault - she really babyed that phone. I liked it so much, I treated myself to the same one for Christmas so we'll see how that one does.
customer_reviews.author: Older then Dirt

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised that this case is as durable as it is. It has held up well the last few months, its easy to clean, doesn't get grungy like some do. I have dropped it a few times and have dropped it on its face and it has protected my phone well and the case hasn't broke. It is a soft silicone type rubber with a hard plastic around the back. Disassembles into two pieces. Again, great case for the money. I actually bought two of these, one for me and one for my daughter and hers posses the same quality I've found in mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again,
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color! This is a 2-piece item and the rubbery portion is soft pliable and seemingly fragile, it can be easily pulled away from the phone and I fear would tear with little effort; however, I have dropped the phone several times on hard surfaces and it did its job and protected my phone. The price is right, so even if the rubber tears at some point, I could buy 10 of them and still be money ahead over my previous cover that fell apart. All in all, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Suez

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is really easy to install and comfortable on your hands. I got this as a gift for my wife after her last one failed. Soft rubber and very nice looking cover. She was very happy with it. I am even happier because this is the second iPhone I had to replace. She drops them like hotcakes I need it something that actually works. !
customer_reviews.author: Edixon Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... it was too bulky for me and I don't like hard cases
customer_reviews.text: I already returned this case as it was too bulky for me and I don't like hard cases. But other than that, I think case was pretty good. However, I felt like the rubber soft part of the case would tear sooner than later, but that didn't actually happen when I owned this case.
customer_reviews.author: Takeshi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely protects my phone
customer_reviews.text: This case has worked awesome so far. I was really picky when choosing a case. My friend recommended this one since it's worked so well for her. It was actually my second choice and I'm beyond happy with it. I drop my phone multiple times a week sometimes a day.. and my phone still works great, no breaks or scratches on my phone, the case itself has a couple scratches though. Would definitely recommend this case and for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light colored case for my phone so I could easily find it in my purse, and would be easy to spot if I set it down somewhere. This color case does the trick! My previous case had hard corners and one of them broke off (after several years). This case has soft, cushiony corners and I've dropped it several times with no ill effects, so I'm giving it a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Borland

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy these cases. I’ve had the same iPhone 6 for the past four years and these cases have done a really good job protecting it. I do replace the case every year. My only issue is that sometimes it’s hard to plug the charging cord in because the material at the bottom is just barely narrow enough to fit the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kshumway

customer_reviews.title: Functional and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a work phone so I was not looking to spend a lot of money. I can say I have dropped the phone on a concrete floor from about 3 feet high and no damage whatsoever. I was initially concerned about having the buttons for power and volume covered but it really is a non issue. I have had problems with other covers that went over the buttons in that I usually look for something that has cutouts instead for the buttons. This case has been perfect and I would look at another case from this manufacturer again for my next work or personal phone.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Michael

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, inexpensive case!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for almost a year and it's been perfect!! Considering it's inexpensive, it is so much more than I'd hoped for. I have dropped my phone many times and it's never broken. The case has never stretched out like some do. It's easy to take off and clean. I'm upgrading my phone now so I need to get a new case and I will get one from this company!
customer_reviews.author: E. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: I am actually still using the case right now! And I have it on my phone without a glass screen protector or anything and I’ve dropped my phone a few times and my screen isn’t cracked, my phone hasn’t gotten water damage from the shower... it’s a really good case. I don’t recommend being careless with your phone like I was but definitely a good case. :)
customer_reviews.author: Livie Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good case. Slim. Pretty. Seems to offer protection from MINOR drops but I wouldn’t trust it from too high of a fall. Problems: The opening in the back leaves the Mac Apple symbol exposed to scratches and dirt. Another issue is the hole for the lightning cord doesn’t seem large enough for my cord so it has slipped out a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Inadia xue

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case like this I've purchased. The first one didn't fit right and I had to rip off the part covering the volume buttons in order to use them. But overall it was okay. After a year, the silicone ripped on one side, so I bought a new one and it fits my iphone 6S perfectly. All the buttons are covered, but work great when you push them. A good cover for a great price. Its pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: muffyroberts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Feminine
customer_reviews.text: Rubber color is a peach-pink on the edges with a soft rose gold brushed metal covering over the back. I have already dropped my phone several times. It is doing the trick. The metal on the back doesn't scratch either. I have had the case for 2 weeks. I gave it a five for durability because for the price who cares how long it will last. It will outlive my phone at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: The case is perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: The case is perfect for the price. I’ve used it for about three weeks and it’s not showing wear and tear too quick. Wipes clean. I don’t have problems plugging in my charger due to the bottom of it being flexible. I’ve had too many cases that as soon as I plug it in to charge it or use my aux cord I either break the case or I have to take the phone out of the case for it to work. That’s not a problem with this case.
customer_reviews.author: LDM

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine for the price- seems sturdy and protective
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine for the price- seems sturdy and protective, had no problem getting it on my phone. The only issue for me is the color. While the hard outer shell could be considered “rose gold,” and does more or less match the photos on Amazon, the inner silicone case is a sickly Pepto Bismol-esque shade of pink. Just not what I was expecting color-wise. It is possible that I’m just not a pink person, but I do think the shade of the silicone part isn’t an exact match for what is pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: BiblioChic

customer_reviews.title: Love the rose color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. The color is great and it keeps my phone safe. I gave it one star off due to the rubber being too thick around the charging port and that I have to push it up slightly to get my charger in (I do have an after market charger that is larger but that wasn't an issue with my last case). The rubber is cut closer to the port at the top, which I consider a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This case makes me feel like I have a new phone. It’s easy to put on, easy to grip and is durable. Much better than the case I had in it before. My ONLY complaint is that the opening for the lightning charger is a little tight so sometimes you have to adjust the rubber piece to charge the phone. Otherwise, love the look, quality and function.
customer_reviews.author: DeeL42

customer_reviews.title: One of the better brands for phone cases
customer_reviews.text: Love the dual layer silicone case. Nice and soft for cushion for protein. Only downside on this 6S case is it’s impossible to access the silent switch because it’s surrounded by the hard plastic and not the soft silicone. My only real complaint was I’m paying for prime and had to pay even more for 2 day shipping for this phone case. I’m not sure about that one. Dunno if this is a new thing for amazon
customer_reviews.author: M. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: This is for my wife, the one I ordered it for. She loved her first one and had it for about two years, according to her. Well the silicone started to to stretch and lose it elasticity. I cannot say for certain how it holds up on drops or such, but she has had both that phone and case for a few years and the scree has yet to break *knocks on wood*
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Case Ever
customer_reviews.text: I used various phone cases throughout the years for my iphone 6S, and this has got to be the best one. My phone feels very secure, and it's easy to hold. I've dropped my phone several times, and have yet to get any cracks or scratches on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone Case I have a hard time finding phone cases because i hate them. I hate that they make the phone feel bigger than what it is. I loved this phone case because it is a slim fit and the back makes the phone feel like it doesn't have a case on. I've tried the Outter Box in the past and i dislike it because it's too bulky, this case is a "SLIM FIT" it almost feels as if i'm holding my phone w/out a case. I've had it for a couple day's and so far it's survived a couple falls. If anything changes i will come back and update that on my review.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Color representation is off!
customer_reviews.text: I love my rose gold phone and I needed to get a new case that wasn't going to break the bank. I like that its rose gold pretty much matches spot on but the soft rubbery part is more PEACH than pink, as in all of the pictures. The silence button is very recessed making you have to use a fingernail but the rest works well enough for the cost. A quick fix is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: RILisa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to buy this case due to the bad reviews, but I love it. No fading, isn’t broken, has protected my phone from drops. Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the silicone part is pretty thin and makes me nervous that it will tear, and its kinda hard to get the case off while being gentle to avoid breaking. Other then that, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sturgill

customer_reviews.title: Rubber part is good
customer_reviews.text: I'm only using the rubber part of the case. The slickness of the other part would make it hard to grip. Trouble gripping the phone is why I bought it. The rubber part works well but the other part would make it more resistant to breakage. Just wish it wasn't so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: K. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great Case! So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. It’s easy to hold and looks really nice. It seems to be of good quality, especially for this price! Honestly, I had a nice silicone one before this but it kept pulling out my hair when I would take the phone away from my ear! This one doesn’t do that but it’s not slippery, the silicone shell holds a nice grip! Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this case, second one I have bought. First one last over a year.
customer_reviews.text: cute, comfy, dropped my phone all the time, like at least once a day and it has not required a repair. My bunny even chewed off part of the case but I still used it for several months and it still worked. It starts to look slightly dingy after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone case!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three of these already! I love it! I love the shiny rose pink color and that it really protects my phone. I have dropped my phone so many times and nothing has happened to my screen. The price is also great! I definitely recommend this phone case and I will continue to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: W. Sevilla

customer_reviews.title: Works when on but not easy to put on so 3 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe covers are often tight so hard to put on, we don't have much experience. Strong male hands can do it ok. I pushed hard and it did work, color,etc were good. Get your not weak and elderly brother or spouse if you are female if it doesn't go on easy. Seems like it protects fine, 6 months of use now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very brittle and easily breakable plastic
customer_reviews.text: It was cute when i got it! I’ve dropped it so many times I’ve cracked off nearly every corner of the plastic... very brittle and easily breakable plastic. But what do you expect for the price?! Good as a sub when needed but not for long term use
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: My teen loved the case
customer_reviews.text: My teen loved the case. It was really slim and she was able to put it in her pocket with ease. These is NOT a cover for the screen, fyi (it doesn't advertise for one either); just fyi. It was a true rose gold too. She choose that vs the iPhone 6 wallet case with credit card holder/pouch -- same color. As a youth, she showed me how she could put a credit card or two underneath the secure ULAK SLIM case. I was awed!! NOW, she has a hidden compartment.
customer_reviews.author: ANITA WOODS

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent but not super great
customer_reviews.text: The silicone part is soft, almost too soft to protect the phone. I’ve had my phone for 3+ years now. This is the third case. First one cracked. Second one wore out. Within third day of having this one, the protective screen on the phone cracked, not the phone itself. I would spend more money on a sturdier case. The silicone does make it difficult to slide in/out of pants pockets since jean manufactures don’t think women need roomy pockets
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: it is as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: i chose this case for the color and positive reviews. its cute and somewhat protective. I took a star off the overall review because my charger has trouble plugging in while this case is on my phone and it is tricky to take off as well. i feel like i could break it if i remove it too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My third one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this 3times. Just love it. Before using this, my kids and I have keep dropping phone and keep breaking the screen... maybe once in 2months... each time costed me about $100 to fix. After changing to this cover, of cause still dropping it... but never broke. This is my money saver!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for me! It's very durable and I love the double protection it provides. I love the color of it as well! The first case I had lasted me about 3 years. It would have lasted longer, but I broke the plastic piece next to the volume button trying to take the cover off. I ended up buying the same cover again, which I've used for the last 2 (?) years. I would definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent case.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad case. The color is true. It's one that has a rubbery case with a hard case over it. The rubbery part isn't very tight though and can come away easier. I'm afraid it will make it harder to get to the buttons after a while. Still, a good case.
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: A really good case at a great price
customer_reviews.text: It’s holding up well after several months of use and a couple of drops. It is thin and the rubber shifts easily at the top and bottom, but I may just be used to the harder case I had before this. It seems to be doing the job. The look is sleek and I do love how it complements the color of my phone. Other cases seem to totally hide that feature. The metal part is holding up well also. It hasn’t scratched and the finish isn’t wearing off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really speak to the durability or the sturdiness of my new phone case because I have only had it a few days. I bought it because my old case cracked on the corner. I have a rose gold iPhone so I bought the case in rose gold. The color of the silicone/ rubbery part is more peach colored than rose gold. It’s not too bad. The case does not cover the screen at all, so if you need screen protection this is not the product for you. The fit is perfect and overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bbqueen

customer_reviews.title: Larger slots for charging
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know how it went together on my phone I only had otter box b4 New charger didn’t fit with case on. This has bigger slots and I don’t have to take it apart to charge!! I just got it so idk about durability yet
customer_reviews.author: GMH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best case I’ve ever brought this is my second one. I brought the second one because the first one I’ve had for a year and is still going strong but the paint has worn off slightly around the edges and I just wanted a new one. Opted for this one Because I know this is the best case around highly protective and durable. Also looks gorgeous too.
customer_reviews.author: Sollysf

customer_reviews.title: Color off
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered for iPhone 8. Obviously doesn’t fit unless you don’t use your back camera. Ordered rose gold. Wanted people to know how different the color looks. The rubber is very peachy. The rose gold plastic is darker and flatter than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and easy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. So far so good! I love the fact that it is easy to press the home button without feeling a barrier below it. It goes perfectly elegant with the rose gold tone.
customer_reviews.author: Zllvs

customer_reviews.title: Overheats My iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this case since it matched my rose gold iPhone but can’t use it. Within 30 minutes of putting the case on my phone overheated and froze up. After it cooled down I tried again and had the same results. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Skookum

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Got this a few days ago for iPhone 6s. Only missing one star due to thinking it would be a little more sturdy. But I like it. I take care of my phones pretty well so I'm sure this case would go the distance for me no problems. But if you are not user friendly I might not get this one. But like the color. Can touch all my buttons no problem. Worth what I paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: very good case.  just one issue
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my gf and she likes it a lot except we had to cut out around the charger plug area so that the plug wouldn't bounce out. there's too much rubber there for some of the plugs to fit. I used small scissors and cut out a little of the rubber and it's fine now. can't notice it. just weird we had to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, overheats the phone.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, the plastic smells & overheats the phone. It doesn’t safely cushion the cell phone at all. Wish I could return it but it’s past the time period.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Match with price
customer_reviews.text: Item is the same as the picture and good quality. There were no damage and the color of the phone case didn’t fade when I first open it and put it on my phone. I love the texture it’s very satisfying and wasn’t lying about having a good grip when you hold the phone
customer_reviews.author: Sherrdonna Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked Phone Did Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: We specifically purchased this unlocked phone for overseas travel. We were never able to activate the phone, so it was & still is unusable! Even with outside technical help, the phone would not activate. In the end, we were overseas without a cell phone which I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera opening is miss placed, useless
customer_reviews.text: The camera hole is not placed correctly. I ordered the correct version for my iPhone 6s, the case is nice looking, fits snuggly and all other buttons are correct but the silicone part goes right thru the camera lens. Very disappointing, will be returning and looking for another brand
customer_reviews.author: Marina P

customer_reviews.title: Really Like My New Phone Call
customer_reviews.text: My last case tore up so I needed a new one. This one was pretty, functional and very inexpensive. Would definitely recommend to a friend and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: erobertson

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, fits well
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter's phone. It fits nicely, is slim, comfortable to hold. I only took off one star since the color is a little more "orange" than it looks on the computer screen. I think they can still call it rose gold but it borders on being more orange than pinkish or rosie.
customer_reviews.author: luvonlineshoppin

customer_reviews.title: then I've had a beautiful vibrant ULAK case that lasted for over a year
customer_reviews.text: My daughter managed to have this fall apart on her in, about 2 weeks. I have had hit and miss luck with ULAK cases in the past...I've had the color fade and fit deform until I threw it away, then I've had a beautiful vibrant ULAK case that lasted for over a year. Maybe we got unlucky with this particular case. It did look nice while it lasted, though.
customer_reviews.author: J. a

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Study light and perfect color. Nice soft vision with metal on the back and sides but sit on top and bottom and bottoms. This is the best case I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: AmRandy Burmanazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect since I paid $6 for it, but it's my favorite case to date. I love the pink color. I've dropped my phone a couple of times and it's def saved me. Doesn't have a screen cover so if you have a tendency to crack your screen you'll prob want to invest in a screen cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for its cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought this almost a year ago and it has held well. I have dropped my phone multiple times and case did its job. Color is great, slim fit (didn't add bulk). The silicone part has stretched slightly but overall still holding good to my phone. I'm looking to upgrade my phone and will definitely consider their cases for the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Glow

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this case for a couple weeks and so far its held up well. It looks like any other higher priced case and seems to work like one. The lip on the screen part is big enough Im not worried about dropping it on its face and it breaking. Gave it 4 stars because the rubber on the top is a little flimsy and It comes loose if you mess with it too much. Not sure how long it will last if Im not careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: GrizzlyMark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I received the Rose Gold cover today and could basically copy and paste another reviewer’s post. The color is not pink/rose gold and the cutout placement for the camera is not correct. Will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: dtkfw

customer_reviews.title: Works well but gets dirty easily.
customer_reviews.text: It's protected my phone really well so far, which is good because I drop it all the time. My only issue has been that the pink silicone gets dirty really easily; it's picked up every speck of link from my pocket and doesn't look overly attractive. I'd probably buy this case again, but in another color that doesn't get dirty so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Steph A.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable priced/decent case
customer_reviews.text: It is quite pretty. However, although I like the dual (silicone & hard case) protection, it is cumbersome to put on and take off. So it’s best not to get it dirty often as would be annoying to clean. Also, the hard case can be slippery. Bottom line, it’s worth the price but don’t expect it to be high-end.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a new phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this case. The padding around the corners of the phone are rubbery, so there's less chipping when the phone gets dropped. I generally need a new case once a year, and this one was at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this new case - replacing a different type. The color is really more of a peach or salmon than pink, but like it. I've dropped it once since new case and no damage to iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Medley

customer_reviews.title: Overall, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case! I’ve had it for about a month and it’s been great! The color doesn’t fade and the edge goes over the phone slightly to protect the screen which I really like. Only downside is if you have a screen protector- make sure it lines up nicely with the case, otherwise it will lift the protection. But overall great case!
customer_reviews.author: Sharayah

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: This card case provides a very sturdy protection. Speaking from experience, my phone has been dropped numerous times and the only cause damage to the case. My phone is perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what i ordered, and its a beautiful case! Simple yet chic. The rubber and metallic are separate pieces just an fyi. It's super easy to put them on! Beautiful grip, sturdy in my personal opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Ari Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Very good value, really protects my phone
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed w the look of this case and how well it protects my phone without being extremely bulky. After a couple months, part of the plastic over the side button came off but hasn’t affected the use of the button. I drop my phone a lot and it doesn’t bend or tear it up and most importantly, protects the corners of the phone so IT doesn’t break.
customer_reviews.author: dmdanielle

customer_reviews.title: A great value for a great case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while back after my old case broke. Priced right and good quality- the color is really very nice too! Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product came!
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong product, and I know I searched far and wide for an iPhone 6 Plus case that was affordable for me at the time. When it came in the mail I was upset to find out that the case was for the iPhone 6. And not the 6 plus. Big difference in size. So here it sits useless and a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this case. Honestly thought it would be cheaper quality for the price, but it actually seems very protective! Was supposed to be temporary until I get a Speck case or something.. but I just never ended up replacing it! Loooooove the rose gold color too. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Great case, small tear in the silicone
customer_reviews.text: This case (I got the pink one) is very pretty and fits perfectly onto my iPhone 6s. It is slightly difficult to hold and type due to the smooth hard back cover, but overall I'm pretty happy with it aside from the fact that there is a small tear in the silicone at the top of my case. The tear was present when I opened the box, but I need a case so I'm trying to ignore it. Overall a great case, just would have loved it more if it wasn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for the price you can’t beat it! I would definitely buy it again! The only negative part about it is that it scratches easily but protection wise I 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone case! <3
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could leave more stars! I am in love with this case! It looks so great on my iPhone and is even prettier in person. I am more than satisfied! And it looks perfect with my new Popsocket!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice but will crack phone when you drop your phone.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this product and I dropped my phone and it cracked! This product is nice but if you are looking for a case that will help and not crack when you drop your phone this is not the right case. It’s really stylish but not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is inexpensive, somewhat grippy so that your phone does not slide out of your hand easily, and easy to clean as it does not have any crevices
customer_reviews.author: Nearing Death

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty phone cover and it fits perfectly, but only lasted 7 months before it ripped on one side, making it unusable. Luckily this item was not expensive, so not a problem to replace it periodically. Just don't expect it to last a year or more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Nice to look at, nice to hold. Far less likely to slip and drop and smash my phone (if only I’d got it a week ago )
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Berg

customer_reviews.title: Best inexpensive phone case
customer_reviews.text: This case is so nice, has the soft rubbery inside and the hard protector outside. Great deal for the price and best case I have owned. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color makes phone look BRAND NEW
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING HOW A CASE MAKES A PHONE LOOK BRAND NEW! We purchased Rose Gold beats for our teen and when she opened this along with her Rose Gold iphone case... she screamed. This color is amazing and it made her iphone look brand new. It fits great and looks amazing. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. Baehre

customer_reviews.title: Not too durable. Slippery
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten ulak cases before and really loved them. Got a new phone and needed a new case, this is slippery. I can tell it will not hold up long. :( the silicone is looser fitting and already getting misshaped from in and out of my pocket. Won’t be getting this one again.
customer_reviews.author: 3 BOYS...AHHHH!!

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for - colors not as depicted
customer_reviews.text: While you should expect not to get something extremely strong and sturdy, this was just a bit more flimsy than I was expecting. The color was not quite the same as pictured and I definitely would like it to be more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the hard part of the case. The flexible, rubbery part is less of a rose gold and more of a peach color which is slightly disappointing. I’ve dropped the phone a couple times and the case has kept it from cracking. Overall, it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS CASE. SO great.
customer_reviews.text: WAY impressed. You get SO MUCH MORE THAN YOU PAY FOR. This thing has been put through the ringer of an Alaskan summer. Great purchase, very pleased with the quality considering the low price. One of Amazon’s hidden treasures.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite case that I've bought from Amazon. I love that it's simple, easy to apply, and best of all it clears the charge port! Some of the cases the chargers don't quite get through and lose connection or I have to remove the case to charge them. Not so with this case! Perfect. It's also survived a 6 year old and a few drops. :)
customer_reviews.author: mommabug

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little case for my wife for her iPhone 6 when her Lifeproof case got ruined by 'life'. She likes the cover and feel of it and it has done a good job so far. We've had it for about 2 months. Go get a standard screen protector to go with it and you are all set.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Stain Resistant
customer_reviews.text: My old case got scuffed so quickly and the other day there was some weird black mark on the corner and I was so sad that it wasn't gonna go away but i just rubbed it a little and it went away immediately! The case hasn't broken yet and the color is very pretty and I get compliments all the time. It also protects my phone when I drop it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter but after she tried to put it on we realized it was the wrong size. She needed an iPhone 7 case but this is really beautiful in color and you can tell it is sturdy for keeping the phone safe.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I had a phone case from korea that lasted years and finally broke. I needed another good case but iPhone 6 isn’t that popular anymore. This is a really good phone case I like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case three months ago and it has held up well. I was concerned the light pink color would look dirty but it does not. No concerns and no cracks on my phone!!
customer_reviews.author: S Fond

customer_reviews.title: Covered buttons very prominent
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit and feel of this case, however, I really HATE the covered buttons. They make those controls way to touchy and I’m constantly either turning the volume down or almost powering down. I plan on returning the item for a different style
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Love my new phone case.
customer_reviews.text: My new phone case arrived very quickly and was exactly as advertised. It's done well to protect my phone from me. There have been times when the charging cord has slipped out, but it was easy enough to lift the silicone and overlap it to keep it in place. Love the color, as it perfectly matched the color of my phone and it's not bulky, so my phone still fits in my pocket and purse easily
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. I've gotten so many compliments on its appearance, and I've even dropped my phone a few times and it has protected my screen each time. Plus it's inexpensive! So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TJW74

product_meta.title: ULAK iPhone 6S Case, iPhone 6 Case, Slim Fit Dual Layer Soft Silicone & Hard Back Cover Bumper Protective Shock-Absorption & Anti-Scratch Case for Apple iPhone 6 / 6S 4.7 inch- Rose Gold
product_meta.description: Color:Rose GoldiPhone 6S Case,iPhone 6 Case, ULAK Hybrid Slim Dual Layer Protective Hard Back Cover Soft Silicone Case for Apple iPhone 6 / 6S 4.7 inch. Slim Dual Layers Hybrid iPhone 6/6S Case for adding style, protection, and color to your iPhone. Cute and colorful: it accentuates with vibrant colors and a cute stylish design. If you cover your iPhone, do it with style! Functionality paramount: perfectly molded precise full access to ports, buttons and all features without ever having to remove your case. Fits like a glove: this iPhone 6/6S 4.7 inch Dual Layer case is designed to be your iPhone's glove! It is smooth yet durable (inside and out) protecting against scratches, comes in 2 layers with premium hard PC and soft silicone for shock protection, and made to be as thin as possible. Package: 1 x Case for Apple iPhone 6/6S 4.7 inch
feature_bullets: iPhone 6S case rose gold hybrid slim fit dual layer protective fit for Apple iPhone 6 / 6S 4.7 inch,Will Not Fit iPhone 6 Plus 5.5 inch, iPhone 6S Plus 5.5 inch or any other device
iPhone 6/6S case is made from Polycarbonate hard back cover+ flexible Silicone inner core dual layer protection from scratches and chips from accumulating
Slim and lightweight dual layer design provides protection without adding bulk to your iphone 6/6s 4.7 inch cellphone
Pronounced buttons easy to access and press, while large cutouts for audio and charging fit most cables, allows you to maximize the function of your Apple iPhone 6/6s with the case on
Comfortable Design: Rounded edges and a soft coating make for a comfortable and easy grip ; Color might vary due to the difference in lighting
